welcome_message_body: Welcome to Springs, USA! This charming city is known for its quaint downtown, beautiful parks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Springs has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Springs Pizza
restaurants.description: Springs Pizza is a pizzeria located in East Hampton.
restaurants.address: 841 Springs Fireplace Rd (Fort Pond blvd), East Hampton, NY 11937

restaurants.name: Harbor Bistro
restaurants.description: Harbor Bistro is a american restaurant located in East Hampton.
restaurants.address: 313 Three Mile Harbor HC Rd, East Hampton, NY 11937

restaurants.name: Bostwick’s On The Harbor
restaurants.description: Bostwick’s On The Harbor is a seafood restaurant located in East Hampton.

restaurants.name: Si Si
restaurants.description: Si Si is a mediterranean restaurant located in East Hampton.
restaurants.address: 295 Three Mile Harbor HC Rd, East Hampton, NY 11937

restaurants.name: Montauk Marketplace
restaurants.description: Montauk Marketplace is a deli located in East Hampton.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Hampton Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters specifically to private jet travelers, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montauk Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montauk Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New London Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New London Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport by connecting to the NLA network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westerly State Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westerly State Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport is a small but modern facility offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free of charge.
